availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Baltzell (Frankfort, Kentucky, hatter and councilman)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, hatter and councilman. Maryland native. Married to Charlotte Baltzell. Councilman on the Frankfort City Council from 1857 to 1865. Hatter in Frankfort in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 74.; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 17; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 12.; "Frankfort Municipal Elections," The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), January 6, 1857, p. 2.
